title: Ep. 201: How to Take Better Photos with Nigel Barker
itunes:title: Ep. 201: How to Take Better Photos with Nigel Barker
itunes:subtitle: Photographer Nigel Barker, the reality TV host and former judge of America’s Next Top Model, teaches us how to be better photographers (and subjects!); explains why preserving memories is important and how “smizing" is more than smiling w...
description:
Photographer Nigel Barker, the reality TV host and former judge of America’s Next Top Model, teaches us how to be better photographers (and subjects!); explains why preserving memories is important and how “smizing" is more than smiling with your eyes; and shares his tips and tricks for cutting his own hair. Plus: help for anyone with stress-induced acne, the week’s beauty news (Drunk Elephant’s new hair and body lines, fake coronavirus remedies, and booming at-home hair color sales), and more. 


Want more Fat Mascara?

Our secret Facebook group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand

Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jennedit 

Twitter: @fatmascara 

Email: info@fatmascara.com 

Website: fatmascara.com

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
